fields.name: ApiEndpoint
fields.description: Describe the endpoint we should pull the data from

fields.name: EndTimeAttributeName
fields.description: This will be used the query events from the end of the time window

fields.name: HTTPMethod
fields.description: The http method type we will use in the poll request, GET or POST

fields.name: Headers
fields.description: Describe the headers sent in the poll request

fields.name: QueryParameters
fields.description: Describe the query parameters sent in the poll request

fields.name: QueryParametersTemplate
fields.description: For advanced scenarios for example user name/password embedded in nested JSON payload

fields.name: QueryTimeFormat
fields.description: The time format will be used the query events in a specific window

fields.name: QueryWindowInMin
fields.description: The window interval we will use the pull the data

fields.name: RetryCount
fields.description: Describe the amount of time we should try and poll the data in case of failure

fields.name: StartTimeAttributeName
fields.description: This will be used the query events from a start of the time window

fields.name: TimeoutInSeconds
fields.description: The number of seconds we will consider as a request timeout
